description:
In this course titled " Quit Smoking Now Using NLP And Self Hypnosis Techniques " By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn many powerful and simple self hypnosis and NLP techniques to completely overcome smoking and remove the urge and desire to smoke from your subconscious mind.

This course contains 13 lectures and 30 minutes of content which will help you quit smoking instantly by programming your subconscious mind . The techniques used in this course are Relaxation techniques , Affirmations, Visualizations , Mind Triggers , Anchoring etc .

This course contains -

  • -Introduction
  • -Reasons To Quit Smoking
  • -Why do people smoke?
  • -Relaxation Technique Using Self Hypnosis
  • -Change The Desire/Urge To Smoke
  • -Quit Smoking Using Anchoring Techniques
  • -Quit Smoking Using Mind Trigger Techniques
  • -Other Alternatives To Smoking To Get Same Results
  • -Quit Smoking Using Your Imagination
  • -Small Tips To Quit The Urge Of Smoking
  • -Quit Smoking Using Self Hypnosis Techniques
  • -Quit Smoking Using Powerful Visualization
  • -Summary Of The Course
title: Quit Smoking Now Using NLP And Self Hypnosis Techniques
